gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Mavericks 147, Jazz 97
gameRecap.excerpt: The Mavericks snapped a 2-game losing streak as they defeated the Jazz, 147-97. Luka Doncic led the Mavericks with 40 points, 10 rebound, 11 assists, and 6 3PT FG, which he totaled in 3 quarters of play. Kyrie Irving added 26 points, three rebounds, and four assists. Ochai Agbaji had a season-high 21 points for the Jazz in the loss. Dallas improves to 12-8 as Utah moves to 7-14.
